DesignChecker: Visual Design Support for Blind and Low Vision Web Developers
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of 5 websites before and after using DesignChecker. The after websites have improved aesthetically according to design pricinples (e.g., color harmony, alignment).

publications.name: Long-Form Answers to Visual Questions from Blind and Low Vision People
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of longform visual question answers across humans, GPT-4V and Gemini. Each answer sentence is labeled with a discourse role (e.g., confirmation, answer) and information source (e.g., image quality, image content).

publications.name: Context-Aware Image Descriptions for Web Accessibility
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of a couch listing image with a context free description that does not contain much information about the couch, and a context-aware description that focuses on the couch.

publications.name: Design Considerations for Photosensitivity Warnings in Visual Media
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of an interface for browsing potentially harmful video segments.

publications.name: DreamStruct: Understanding Slides and User Interfaces via Synthetic Data Generation
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of DreamStruct's UI generation that starts with a UI description, then generates HTML UI code, then generates images for the UI and outputs the final user interface.

publications.name: Barriers to Photosensitive Accessibility in Virtual Reality
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of a table of potential accessibility barriers in VR.

publications.name: ShortScribe: Making Short-Form Videos Accessible with Hierarchical Video Summaries
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of the ShortScribe pipeline. The pipeline takes the video as input, transcribes it and describes the keyframes, then uses GPT-4 to generate multiple types of descriptions.

publications.name: COMPA: Using Conversation Context to Achieve Common Ground in AAC
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of the COMPA interface that features views for the AAC user and their conversational partners.

publications.name: GeoLatent: A Geometric Approach to Latent Space Design for Deformable Shape Generators
GenAssist: Making Image Generation Accessible
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail depicting four generated image options of a young chef cooking dinner and their descriptions.

publications.name: Exploring Community-Driven Descriptions for Making Livestreams Accessible
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of a livestream paired with a set of descriptions with timestamps.

publications.name: AVscript: Accessible Video Editing with Audio-Visual Scripts
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of the audio visual script that includes a transcript of the video coupled with detected errors in the video footage (e.g., camera blur).

publications.name: Exploratory Thematic Analysis of Crowdsourced Photosensitivity Warnings
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail screenshot of a forum people use to report flashing lights.

publications.name: SlideSpecs: Automatic and Interactive Presentation Feedback Collation
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of SlideSpecs featuring numbered slides and audience feedback on the slides.

publications.name: Diffscriber: Describing Visual Design Changes to Support Mixed-Ability Collaborative Presentation Authoring
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of Diffscriber's interface for reviewing slide changes.

publications.name: CrossA11y: Identifying Video Accessibility Issues via Cross-modal Grounding
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail depicting CrossA11y's computational approach that compares video frames with the corresponding audio.

publications.name: Tech Help Desk: Support for Local Entrepreneurs Addressing the Long Tail of Computing Challenges
publications.imageAlt: Three images of Tech Help Desk including the Tech Help Desk classroom, the Tech Help Desk sign on the classroom door and the building entrance.

publications.name: Toward supporting quality alt text in computing publications
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail image of a chart of alt text coverage that appears in the paper.

publications.name: TutorialLens: authoring Interactive augmented reality tutorials through narration and demonstration
publications.imageAlt: A thumnbail image of the tutorial lens interface.

publications.name: Slidecho: Flexible Non-Visual Exploration of Presentation Videos
publications.imageAlt: A thumnail image of SlideCho's interface for surfacing information in slide videos.

publications.name: Co-designing Socially Assistive Sidekicks for Motion-based AAC
publications.imageAlt: A photograph taken at a workshop with a person using an AAC device, her close conversational partner, and puppeteers. All participants stand around a table full of craft supplies and are engaged in coversation.

publications.name: What Makes a Video Non-Visually Accessible?
publications.imageAlt: A YouTube search result augmented with accessibility information. A thumbnail of the video shows a woman in Rome. The rest of the video information reads as follows: Rome, Italy! Tips & Photo Spots by Ruby Keyvani. 5/7 Somewhat Accessible. 76% of the video is speech. The speech is descriptive but contains many visual references (3 per minute). Visual changes occur infrequently (5 shots per minute); few on-screen objects are described (20%).

publications.name: Say It All: Feedback for Improving Non-Visual Presentation Accessibility
publications.imageAlt: A slide from a lecture where most text is in black but some of the text has been colored green to represent that it has been spoken by the presenter. There is an image with a squiggly circle brush on the slide, and it has a green border to indicate the presenter described the image.

publications.name: Controlling Dialogue Generation with Semantic Exemplars.
publications.imageAlt: A thumnail image of a semantic exemplar with three corresponding examples.

publications.name: Rescribe: Authoring and Automatically Editing Audio Descriptions.
publications.summary: (~22% acceptance rate, 10 pages) -- Highlighted in Future of CSCW/UIST Plenary, and UIST Keynote.
publications.imageAlt: On one side, a set of extended audio description sentences with their corresponding frames, and in the other column a set of inline audio description sentences and the same frames. The shortened descriptions are as follows: `Shots of lavender in a farmers market' is shortened to `Shots of lavender', `Red flowers against a white house and blue sky' is shortened to `Red flowers', `a courtyard and a pool' is not shortened, `Gaby bikes along a path' is shortened to `Close up of french fries', and `Close up of tater tots and french fries' is shortened to `Close up of french fries'

publications.name: Disability and the COVID-19 Pandemic: Using Twitter to Understand Accessibility during Rapid Societal Transition.
publications.imageAlt: Screenshot of a tweet by @CDCgov from April 1, 2020 3:55pm: Actions to reduce spread of the virus, such as social distancing, are key to #FlattenTheCurve. 2 of 3 (original tweet link: https://twitter.com/CDCgov/status/1245439600472084486) The tweet contains an image of the common public health infographic about “flattening the curve”, but the tweet did not include alt text for the image. The image shows an example of a common flatten the curve info-graphic. A tall peak indicates the height of the pandemic if left unchecked, and a shorter spread out curve depicts the effects of social distancing efforts.

publications.name: Making GIFs Accessible.
publications.imageAlt: A cartoon stylized version of a popular reaction GIF of Oprah Winfrey shrugging. She turns to look to the camera, glances to the side, stares at the camera, then shrugs with her palms up.

publications.name: Making Mobile Augmented Reality Applications Accessible.
publications.imageAlt: Two example prototypes for making AR apps accessible. A: Foundational Accessibility. Screenshot of a virtual chair with a voice over target around it, a speech bubble shows the app announcing 'Back of chair with blue cushion'. B: Scanning. Screenshot of AR grid overlaid on a coffee table. Speech bubbles show the app announcing 'Found a new horizontal surface' and 'Scanned 2 surfaces totaling 2.3 square meters'.

publications.name: Conversational Agency in Augmentative and Alternative Communication.
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail with a conversation between a person using an AAC device and two other people.

publications.name: Twitter A11y: A Browser Extension to Make Twitter Images Accessible.
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail with illegible examples of tweet images and their corresponding alt text.

publications.name: Investigating Evaluation of Open-Domain Dialogue Systems With Human Generated Multiple References.
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of a paper figure showing three memes with descriptions.

publications.name: Making Memes Accessible.
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of a paper figure showing three memes with descriptions.

publications.name: Saliency in VR: How do people explore virtual environments?
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of a paper figure including nine images with heat maps indicating visual saliency in VR.

publications.name: Shot Orientation Controls for Interactive Cinematography with 360 video.
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of a paper figure indicating three different editing techniques for 360 video: traditional, viewpoint-oriented cuts and active reorientation.

publications.name: Vidcrit: Video-based Asynchronous Video Review.
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of the VidCrit interface with a video on the left and text critiques of the video on the right.

publications.name: SceneSkim: Searching and Browsing Movies Using Synchronized Captions, Scripts and Plot Summaries.
Structuring, Aggregating, and Evaluating Crowdsourced Design Critique.
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail indicating an overview of the CrowdCrit critique process.

publications.name: Video Digests: A Browsable, Skimmable Format for Informational Lecture Videos.
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of the Video Digests interface. Video thumbnails displayed alongside short summaries of the video content.

publications.name: Extracting Structured Data from Doctor-Patient Conversations By Predicting Noteworthy Utterances.
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail showing a line graph of the precision-at-one of an algorithm going up as the number of noteworthy sentences considered rises. After a certain point, the number of noteworthy sentences decreases the precision at one -- indicating that lower quality noteworthy sentences add noise rather than value to the prediction.

publications.name: Twitter A11y: A Browser Extension to Make Twitter Images Accessible.
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail with an illegible system diagram of Twitter A11y.

publications.name: CrowdCrit: Crowdsourcing and Aggregating Visual Design Critique.
publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail indicating an overview of the CrowdCrit critique process.

publications.imageAlt: A thumbnail of the Sifter interface for browsing common sets of image editing commands.
